workshoptitle: Build microservice application using Oracle AI Code Assist and MySQL Heatwave Database

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Environment
tutorials.description: Create a Kubernetes cluster, MySQL and deploy microservice application

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Configure Logging Analytics
tutorials.description: Configure Logging Analytics and Create an APM Domain and obtain Data Upload Endpoint and Private Data KeyÂ

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Enhance application
tutorials.description: Build new microservice using Oracle AI Code Assist

tutorials.title: Lab 4: End to End Application Monitoring using OCI O&M Services
Lab 5: Clean up the workshop environment
